exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench, lower bar to chest, press up explosively

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.instructions: Set bench to 30-45°, press dumbbells from chest level

exercises.name: Cable Chest Fly
exercises.instructions: Stand centered, bring cables together in front of chest

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.instructions: Hands shoulder-width, lower chest to ground, push up

exercises.name: Dumbbell Pullover
exercises.instructions: Lie perpendicular on bench, lower dumbbell behind head

exercises.name: Barbell Row
exercises.instructions: Bent over 45°, pull bar to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, pull chin over bar, lower controlled

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.instructions: Pull bar to upper chest, lean back slightly, squeeze lats

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.instructions: Pull handle to abdomen, keep back straight, squeeze at end

exercises.name: Dumbbell Row
exercises.instructions: One hand on bench, pull dumbbell to hip, elbow close to body

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.instructions: Pull rope to face level, externally rotate shoulders

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Feet hip-width, grip bar, lift by extending hips and knees

exercises.name: Barbell Overhead Press
exercises.instructions: Press bar from shoulders to overhead, keep core tight

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
exercises.instructions: Raise dumbbells to shoulder height, slight forward lean

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.instructions: Press dumbbells from shoulder level to overhead

exercises.name: Cable Lateral Raise
exercises.instructions: Stand sideways to cable, raise arm to shoulder height

exercises.name: Front Raise
exercises.instructions: Raise dumbbells in front to shoulder height, palms down

exercises.name: Reverse Pec Deck Fly
exercises.instructions: Face machine, pull handles back, squeeze shoulder blades

exercises.name: Barbell Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl bar from thighs to shoulders, keep elbows stationary

exercises.name: Dumbbell Curl
exercises.instructions: Alternate or simultaneous curls, supinate at top

exercises.name: Hammer Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl with neutral grip (palms facing each other)

exercises.name: Tricep Pushdown
exercises.instructions: Push cable down fully, keep elbows at sides, squeeze triceps

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead, lower behind head, extend arms

exercises.name: Close-Grip Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Narrow grip on bar, lower to chest, press up focusing on triceps

exercises.name: Dips
exercises.instructions: Lower body by bending elbows, push back up to start

exercises.name: Preacher Curl
exercises.instructions: Arms on preacher pad, curl bar focusing on biceps contraction

exercises.name: Barbell Squat
exercises.instructions: Bar on back, squat to parallel, drive through heels

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Hinge at hips, lower bar to shins, feel hamstring stretch

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.instructions: Press platform away with feet shoulder-width

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.instructions: Extend legs fully, squeeze quads at top, lower controlled

exercises.name: Leg Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl legs to glutes, squeeze hamstrings, lower controlled

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.instructions: Rear foot elevated, lower front leg to 90°, drive up

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step forward into lunge, alternate legs continuously

exercises.name: Calf Raise
exercises.instructions: Rise on toes as high as possible, lower with control

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbell at chest, squat deep, keep chest up

exercises.name: Hip Thrust
exercises.instructions: Upper back on bench, bar on hips, thrust up squeezing glutes

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold body straight from head to heels, engage core

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, lift shoulders off ground, squeeze abs

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.instructions: Seated, lean back, rotate torso side to side

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, raise legs to 90°, lower with control

exercises.name: Cable Woodchop
exercises.instructions: Rotate torso pulling cable diagonally across body

exercises.name: Ab Wheel Rollout
exercises.instructions: Roll wheel forward maintaining straight body, pull back

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.instructions: Plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest rapidly

exercises.name: Decline Sit-up
exercises.instructions: On decline bench, sit up fully, lower with control

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold body straight on side, hips elevated, core engaged

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.instructions: Kneel with rope overhead, crunch down bringing elbows to knees

exercises.name: Incline Barbell Press
exercises.instructions: Bench at 30-45°, press bar from chest to lockout

exercises.name: T-Bar Row
exercises.instructions: Bent over, pull bar to chest, keep back flat

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.instructions: Start with palms facing in, rotate and press overhead

exercises.name: Concentration Curl
exercises.instructions: Seated, elbow on inner thigh, curl focusing on peak contraction

exercises.name: Front Squat
exercises.instructions: Bar on front shoulders, squat keeping torso upright

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.instructions: Alternate elbow to opposite knee, extend other leg
